backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining state maps, user/account types, and integrating storage, access control, and migration logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module copying userProfiles and transactions from old actor state to new actor structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, impacted files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to detailed functional descriptions and behaviors.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining build-time version configuration.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, SEO tags, structured data, favicons, and Google Analytics script.
frontend/netlify.toml: Netlify configuration for SPA routing, security headers, caching, and ads.txt handling.
frontend/public/_headers: Headers configuration for ads.txt with content type, caching, and noindex.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rules ensuring ads.txt and SPA routing behavior.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Ads.txt declaration listing authorized advertising partner.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon with finance-themed icon, currency strokes, and growth arrow graphic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures app routing, authentication, initial profile setup dialog, and global providers including React Query and theme.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Displays an access denied screen with login prompts when a user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AIChatbot.tsx: Implements an interactive chatbot with message handling, visual insights generation, and integration with transaction and balance data.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsGuard.t: Blocks or allows analytics page access based on user preferences and shows guidance when analytics are disabled.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main authenticated layout with navigation, user menu, conditional analytics links, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/BuildVersionBadg: Renders a small badge showing the current build version.
frontend/src/components/CookieConsent.ts: Shows a cookie consent banner for unauthenticated users and stores acceptance with expiry in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation sections, social links, and branded content using router navigation.
frontend/src/components/GoalDeleteConfir: A confirmation dialog for deleting a goal with cancel and destructive action buttons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the site header with navigation, auth actions, and a mobile menu using routing and identity state.
frontend/src/content/defaultBlogPosts.ts: Defines default blog post metadata used as fallback content.
frontend/src/content/defaultQuizQuestion: Provides a large set of predefined quiz questions with answers, explanations, and metadata.
frontend/src/content/staticProblemSoluti: Contains static problem–solution style finance blog entries for direct display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendVersion.ts: Fetches backend version info via the actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrency.ts: Provides currency conversion and formatting utilities based on user preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useDefaultContentInit: Mock mutation hook simulating default content initialization and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useOptimizedQueries.t: Empty file placeholder for optimized query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerformance.ts: Empty file placeholder for performance-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks integrating actors and identity, includes mock blog post data and deterministic responses for frontend-only rendering.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, gradients, dark mode, transitions, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/blog/blogContentCache.t: Implements localStorage-based caching for generated blog content with expiration handling and utility functions to load, save, and clear cache.
frontend/src/lib/blog/generateAdsenseArt: Generates long-form Adsense-style articles based on blog metadata, returning structured article content and metadata.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/budgetLo: Computes a budget plan from income and expenses, selecting budgeting rules, calculating breakdowns, assumptions, savings progress, and surplus.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/healthSc: Computes a financial health score from savings, cash flow, emergency fund, debt, and planning, generating a score and explanation text.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/progress: Calculates completion progress based on weighted required and optional fields.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/projecti: Generates a 12‑month savings projection using monthly savings from the budget plan.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/recommen: Builds savings, investing, and financial improvement recommendations based on savings rate, risk profile, and inputs.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/reminder: Creates an ICS calendar file for a budget reminder scheduled seven days ahead.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exposes build metadata such as version, timestamps, and environment flags with a helper to check target version.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides currency conversion, formatting utilities, and accessors for symbols and names.
Implements a rule‑based assistant that classifies finance queries and generates structured responses without external APIs.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalCoachSuggesti: Generates expense‑reduction suggestions from top spending categories and returns static income‑boosting ideas.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalPlanning.ts: Computes savings‑goal metrics such as remaining amount, required savings, feasibility, and warnings based on income.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalSimulation.ts: Produces three goal‑saving simulation scenarios by varying timelines and calculating required monthly and daily savings.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalTracking.ts: Calculates goal progress, on-track status, and a performance score based on expected vs actual savings progress.
frontend/src/lib/quizProgressStorage.ts: Manages quiz progress in localStorage, including load, save, clear, and update helpers.
frontend/src/lib/serialization.ts: Provides utilities for converting between JS and Motoko types, handling BigInt, timestamps, and recursive serialization.
frontend/src/lib/transactions/monthlyAgg: Computes monthly income, expenses, savings, and top expense categories from transaction data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Provides mission, vision, values, and background information about FinanceWise AI.
frontend/src/pages/AIInsights.tsx: Displays AI-driven financial insights including spending categories, monthly trends, and savings analytics.
frontend/src/pages/AITransparency.tsx: Explains the app’s AI models and capabilities using informational UI components.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Renders a full analytics dashboard with charts, trend calculations, and forms for adding income and expenses. Uses multiple hooks to fetch transactions, category data, and financial trends.
frontend/src/pages/Benefits.tsx: Displays a marketing page listing key product benefits with icons and styled cards. Contains static content emphasizing financial and productivity advantages.
frontend/src/pages/BlogAdmin.tsx: Provides an admin page for initializing default blog and quiz content, gated by identity authentication. Shows status messages and triggers a content generation mutation.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPost.tsx: Fetches and displays a single blog post with generated Adsense-enhanced content, including metadata, hero section, and tags. Handles loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPlanner.tsx: Implements a detailed budget planning tool with extensive input fields, calculations, charts, and recommendations. Generates budget plans, progress tracking, projections, and optional advanced settings.
frontend/src/pages/CAFeatures.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/Calculators.tsx: Provides SIP, lumpsum, FIRE, and tax calculators requiring authentication, each computing financial projections and showing results. Uses stateful form inputs and currency formatting.
frontend/src/pages/Challenges.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/Compare.tsx: Renders a comparison table showing FinanceWise AI features against competitors using a features list and UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Provides a contact page with support info and a form that submits user messages via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/CookiePolicy.tsx: Displays the site's cookie policy with sections explaining cookie types, usage, and related details.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerCare.tsx: Implements a customer care page with support details, FAQs, and a contact form submitted through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main user dashboard showing financial stats, charts, transactions, and forms for adding new entries using multiple data hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DeploymentInfo.tsx: Shows frontend and backend version info, comparing them and warning on mismatches, gated by identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Disclaimer.tsx: Renders a styled disclaimer page with multiple cards explaining educational purpose and non‑advice policies.
frontend/src/pages/DNSCheck.tsx: Empty page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ExpenseLog.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an expense logging page.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Displays a list of FAQs using an accordion within a styled card layout.
frontend/src/pages/Features.tsx: Shows a grid of feature cards describing key app capabilities like AI insights, analytics, and security.
frontend/src/pages/FinanceBlog.tsx: Fetches and displays blog posts in a grid with loading skeletons and a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/FinanceDisclaimer.tsx: Empty placeholder for a finance-related disclaimer page.
frontend/src/pages/FinanceQuiz.tsx: Empty placeholder for a finance quiz page.
frontend/src/pages/FinancialWellness.tsx: Renders a grid of cards highlighting aspects of financial wellness such as security, mindset, and community.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Implements full CRUD for savings goals with dialogs, tracking metrics, suggestions, and transaction-based insights.
frontend/src/pages/GoalTracker.tsx: Empty placeholder for a goal-tracking page.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page showing hero section, features, and stats with navigation to login or learn more.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorks.tsx: Explains the step‑by‑step workflow of the platform using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/InvestmentCalculators: Empty placeholder file for investment calculators page.
frontend/src/pages/Investments.tsx: Empty placeholder file for investments page.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for leaderboard page.
frontend/src/pages/LearnFinance.tsx: Empty placeholder file for finance learning content.
frontend/src/pages/Learning.tsx: Displays quiz statistics, progress, topics, and achievements with identity-protected access.
frontend/src/pages/LearningStockMarket.t: Empty placeholder file for stock market learning page.
frontend/src/pages/Legal.tsx: Empty placeholder file for legal information page.
frontend/src/pages/LegalHub.tsx: Empty placeholder file for legal hub navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LoansEMI.tsx: Empty placeholder file for loans and EMI calculators.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MoneyPsychology.tsx: Interactive personality and risk assessment quiz with scoring and recommendations gated by identity access.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data practices and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Renders the full Privacy Policy page with structured sections detailing data collection, usage, and protections.
frontend/src/pages/public/Home.tsx: Public landing page with hero, features, and CTA sections, using navigation to login and features pages.
frontend/src/pages/PublicQuiz.tsx: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/Quiz.tsx: Implements an authenticated interactive quiz with scoring, progress tracking, and completion results.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Empty placeholder for a refund policy page.
frontend/src/pages/Resources.tsx: Displays categorized financial learning resources with navigation links to guides, videos, calculators, and tools.
frontend/src/pages/Roadmap.tsx: Shows completed and upcoming FinanceWise AI features in a structured product roadmap layout.
frontend/src/pages/Security.tsx: Presents public security information including encryption, blockchain storage, identity, and privacy assurances.
frontend/src/pages/SecurityPrivacy.tsx: Provides authenticated users with security status, privacy settings, and connected device information.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page handling user profile display and updating preferences like theme, notifications, analytics, and currency.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculator.tsx: Empty placeholder for a SIP calculator page.
Empty placeholder for SSL certificate status page.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Static Terms & Conditions page displaying legal text and usage policies.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Enhanced terms page with styled sections outlining rules, permitted use, and prohibited activities.
frontend/src/pages/Transactions.tsx: Transactions page allowing users to view, search, edit, and delete financial transactions.
frontend/src/pages/Updates.tsx: Updates page showing recent version changes and a roadmap of upcoming features.
frontend/src/pages/UseCases.tsx: Use-cases page highlighting different user scenarios and how the app benefits them.
frontend/src/requirements/REQ-10-quiz-no: Defines requirement that the quiz system must remain unchanged and lists protected quiz files.
frontend/src/types/backend-types.ts: Local TypeScript definitions mirroring backend data types for users, transactions, goals, predictions, blog posts, and quizzes.
frontend/src/types/budget-planner.ts: Type definitions for budget planner inputs and generated budget plan structure.
frontend/src/types/local-types.ts: Re-exports selected backend-derived types for frontend convenience.
frontend/src/types/transaction.ts: Local Transaction interface with bigint dates for non-exported backend structure.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, animations, plugins, and theming.
frontend/vercel.json: Vercel deployment config defining build commands, environment variables, rewrites, and security headers.
PERFORMANCE_OPTIMIZATION_PLAN.md: Empty or unavailable content; no optimization details provided.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking requirements, known issues, existing features, and architectural notes for the finance app.
unknown.txt: Outlines expected performance improvements, monitoring setup, next steps, load‑testing recommendations, and key success metrics for a performance optimization plan.
